Detailed Description

2d sprite class.

Sprite2D represents rectangular portion of Image.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

~Sprite2D (   ) 
 

Sprite2D class destructor.

Free all memory used to store sprite data. Please note image object that store sprite pixels will be not deleted.

void Init (  ObjRef< Image >  image_,
Short  x_offs_,
Short  y_offs_,
Short  width_,
Short  height_,
Int  copy_image_direct = 1
) 
 

Performs the complete initialization of Sprite2D class object.

This function must be called before any operations on Sprite2D class object.

Parameters:
image_ Image class object pointer. This image store sprite pixels.
x_offs_ define x value for upper-left corner coordinate of sprite on image.
y_offs_ define y value for upper-left corner coordinate of sprite on image.
width_ define width of sprite.
height_ define height of sprite.
copy_image_direct if not zero than while init do check sprite part of image for transparent or alpha pixels and set sprite alpha or transparent flags else copy image flags direct. Please note Sprite2D class object do not copy or store any pixels direct. All sprite pixels stored in image.

void InitFlags (  DWord  flags_  ) 
 

Set control sprite flags.

Warning! Sixteen hi bits reserved for system.

Parameters:
flags_ define new control sprite flags.

void SetFlag (  Int  f  ) 
 

Set one specified control sprite flag.

Parameters:
f define specified control sprite flag to set.
